tosdr.case: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis

title: You authorise the service to charge a credit card supplied on re-occurring basis
quoteText:
If you choose a recurring subscription for a Game, you acknowledge that payments will be processed automatically (e.g., debited from your Blizzard Balance or charged to your credit card) until you cancel the subscription or the Account.
Blizzard may revise the pricing for the goods and services offered through the Platform at any time.
